languages.text: Команда и Лорд-капитан потеряли счет времени, проведенному в варп-перелете. Корабль, стоны судовых переборок, сообщения Мастера вокса — все это уже было так много раз и будет снова. Что бы ни происходило, офицеры не могли избавиться от ощущения бега по кругу, будто путешествие в Океане Душ вечно и не закончится никогда. Слившаяся в серое ничто рутина наполняла сердца острой тоской, так что многих членов экипажа все чаще посещала мысль о том, чтобы отдаться на растерзание хаотической стихии. Дни шли, а навигатор все не отдавал команду на выход из Имматериума.

traits.locale_text: Команда и Лорд-капитан потеряли счет времени, проведенному в варп-перелете. Корабль, стоны судовых переборок, сообщения вокс-мастера — все это уже было так много раз и будет снова. Что бы ни происходило, офицеры не могли избавиться от ощущения бега по кругу, будто путешествие в Океане Душ вечно и не закончится никогда. Слившаяся в серое ничто рутина наполняла сердца острой тоской, так что многих членов экипажа все чаще посещала мысль о том, чтобы отдаться на растерзание хаотической стихии. Дни шли, а навигатор все не отдавал команду на выход из Имматериума.

languages.text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew have lost track of how much time they have spent in the warp jump. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the Vox Master's reports — it all happened so many times before and would happen yet again. No matter what occurred, the officers could not shake the feeling that they were running in circles, as if the voyage across the Sea of Souls would be eternal. Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.
languages.original_text: Команда и Лорд-капитан потеряли счет времени, проведенному в варп-перелете. Корабль, стоны судовых переборок, сообщения Мастера вокса — все это уже было так много раз и будет снова. traits.locale_text: The crew and Lord Captain lost track of the time spent on the warp journey. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the vox-master reports, everything happened so many times and would happen again. No matter what happened, the officers could not shake the feeling of running in circles, as if the voyage across the Ocean of Souls would be eternal and never come to an end. The routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the heart with anxiety, causing many of the crew members consider submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

Days went by, but the navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

languages.text: 领主舰长和船员们已经记不清他们在这场亚空间跳跃中花了多少时间。舰船本身，舱壁的撞击声，音阵大师的报告——这一切都发生过了很多次，而且还会再次发生。无论发生什么事情，军官们都无法摆脱这样的感觉——他们在原地兜圈子，仿佛这场穿越灵魂之海的航行永无永无止境。例行操作融入了灰色的虚无之中，船员们的心中充满了痛苦。许多船员开始考虑听从外界混沌力量的摆布。日子一天天过去了，但导航者迟迟没有下令离开亚空间。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew have lost track of how much time they have spent in the warp jump. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the Vox Master's reports — it all happened so many times before and would happen yet again. No matter what occurred, the officers could not shake the feeling that they were running in circles, as if the voyage across the Sea of Souls would be eternal. Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长和船员们已经记不清他们在这场亚空间跳跃中花了多少时间。舰船本身，舱壁的撞击声，音阵大师的报告——这一切都发生过了很多次，而且还会再次发生。无论发生什么事情，军官们都无法摆脱这样的感觉——他们在原地兜圈子，仿佛这场穿越灵魂之海的航行永无永无止境。例行操作融入了灰色的虚无之中，船员们的心中充满了痛苦。许多船员开始考虑听从外界混沌力量的摆布。日子一天天过去了，但导航者迟迟没有下令离开亚空间。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y su tripulación han perdido la noción del tiempo que han pasado en el salto de disformidad. La propia nave, el crujido de los muros, los informes del Maestro Voco... todo había sucedido tantas veces, y volvería a suceder. Ocurriera lo que ocurriera, los oficiales no podían librarse de la sensación de que estaban corriendo en círculos, como si el viaje a través del Mar de Almas fuera a ser eterno. Las acciones rutinarias se confundían con la nada gris y llenaban de angustia los corazones de la tripulación. Muchos miembros se plantearon someterse a la merced del caótico poder exterior. Pasaron los días, pero la Navegante no dio la orden de abandonar el Inmaterio.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew have lost track of how much time they have spent in the warp jump. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the Vox Master's reports — it all happened so many times before and would happen yet again. No matter what occurred, the officers could not shake the feeling that they were running in circles, as if the voyage across the Sea of Souls would be eternal. Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán han perdido la noción del tiempo que han pasado en el salto de la disformidad. La propia nave, el crujido de los muros, los informes del Maestro Voco... todo había sucedido tantas veces, y volvería a suceder. Ocurriera lo que ocurriera, los oficiales no podían librarse de la sensación de que estaban corriendo en círculos, como si el viaje a través del Mar de las Almas fuera a ser eterno. Las acciones rutinarias se confundían con la nada gris y llenaban de angustia los corazones de la tripulación. Muchos miembros se plantearon someterse a la merced del caótico poder exterior. Pasaron los días, pero la Navegante no dio la orden de abandonar el Inmaterio.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンとクルーは、もうどれほどワープジャンプに時間かけたか分からなくなっていた。船そのものの問題、壁の軋み、ヴォクス・マスターの報告…全てこれまでに何度も起こって、これからも起こるのだろう。何が起こっても士官は、まるで魂の海を永遠に航海しているかのように、円をぐるぐる回っているのではという疑念を振り払えない。毎日の決まった行動が何もない灰色と混ざり合い、クルーの心は苦痛でいっぱいになる。多くの者達が、外にある混沌の力の慈悲に平伏してしまおうかと考えた。数日が過ぎても、航宙士は非物質世界を離れる命令は出してくれない。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew have lost track of how much time they have spent in the warp jump. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the Vox Master's reports — it all happened so many times before and would happen yet again. No matter what occurred, the officers could not shake the feeling that they were running in circles, as if the voyage across the Sea of Souls would be eternal. Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

クルーとロード・キャプテンは、もうどれほどワープジャンプに時間かけたか分からなくなっていた。船そのものの問題、壁の軋み、ヴォクス・マスターの報告…全てこれまでに何度も起こって、これからも起こるのだろう。何が起こっても士官は、まるで魂の海を永遠に航海しているかのように、円をぐるぐる回っているのではという疑念を振り払えない。毎日の決まった行動が何もない灰色と混ざり合い、クルーの心は苦痛でいっぱいになる。多くの者達が、外にある混沌の力の慈悲に平伏してしまおうかと考えた。数日が過ぎても、航宙士は非物質世界を離れる命令は出してくれない。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} et son équipage ne savent plus combien de temps ils ont passé dans le Warp... Le vaisseau, le grincement des cloisons, les rapports de la maîtresse-vox... tout cela s'est déjà produit un nombre incalculable de fois, et le phénomène ne semble pas près de s'arrêter. Quels que soient les événements, les officiers ne peuvent s'empêcher de penser qu'ils tournent en rond, comme si le trajet à travers la Mer des Âmes allait durer éternellement. La routine se confond avec le néant qui entoure le vaisseau et l'équipage vit dans l'angoisse, à tel point que de nombreuses personnes envisagent de se soumettre à la puissance chaotique qui règne à l'extérieur. Mais les journées se suivent, et la navigatrice ne donne toujours pas l'ordre de quitter l'Immaterium.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew have lost track of how much time they have spent in the warp jump. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the Vox Master's reports — it all happened so many times before and would happen yet again. No matter what occurred, the officers could not shake the feeling that they were running in circles, as if the voyage across the Sea of Souls would be eternal. Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

Mais les journées se suivent, et la navigatrice ne donne toujours pas l'ordre de quitter l'Immaterium.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain und seine Crew haben den Überblick verloren, wie viel Zeit sie im Warpsprung verbracht haben. Das Schiff selbst, das Stöhnen der Schotten, die Berichte des Voxmeisters — es ist alles schon so oft geschehen und wird wieder geschehen. Was auch geschehen sein mochte, die Offiziere konnten das Gefühl nicht loswerden, dass sie sich im Kreis drehten, als würde die Reise durch das Meer der Seelen ewig dauern. Routinearbeiten verschwammen zu einem grauen Nichts und erfüllten die Herzen der Crew mit Unruhe. Viele Mitglieder überlegten, ob sie sich nicht der Gnade der chaotischen Macht außerhalb des Schiffs ausliefern sollten. Tage vergingen, ohne dass der Navigator den ersehnten Befehl gab, das Immaterium zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew have lost track of how much time they have spent in the warp jump. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the Vox Master's reports — it all happened so many times before and would happen yet again. No matter what occurred, the officers could not shake the feeling that they were running in circles, as if the voyage across the Sea of Souls would be eternal. Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan ve mürettebatı, öte sıçramada ne kadar zaman geçirdiklerini artık takip edemez oldu. Geminin iniltisi, bölme panellerinin gıcırtıları, Voks Üstadı'nın raporları... Tüm bunlar daha önce defalarca yaşandı ve tekrar yaşanacak. Ne olursa olsun subaylar, sanki Ruhlar Denizi'nde sonsuz bir yolculuk yapıyormuş gibi hissetmekten kurtulamadı. Rutin işler, gri bir hiçliğe dönüştü ve mürettebatın kalplerini kedere boğdu. Birçokları, dışarıdaki kaotik gücün merhametine teslim olmayı düşündü. Günler geçti ancak Rotacı, Tindiyar'dan çıkış emri vermedi.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew have lost track of how much time they have spent in the warp jump. The vessel itself, the groaning of the bulkheads, the Vox Master's reports — it all happened so many times before and would happen yet again. No matter what occurred, the officers could not shake the feeling that they were running in circles, as if the voyage across the Sea of Souls would be eternal. Routine actions blended into grey nothingness and filled the crew's hearts with anguish. Many members considered submitting to the mercy of the chaotic power outside. Days went by, but the Navigator did not give the order to leave the Immaterium.
